comment.author: 57098752@N07
comment._content:
The building of Athlunkard Bridge began in June ,1826 and was completed December 1830. It connects Limerick City and Co.  Clare.
James and Richard Paine were the architects.
Cost of bridge £7,000.

comment.author: 57122954@N06
comment._content:
Picture shows - The toll house at Arthlunkard bridge Limerick.
Those wishing to enter the City coming from Co. Clare paid
a half -penny and those with a horse and cart  paid one penny.
The tolls were lifted in the year 1884.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: The toll house is still there, see Streetview
